2. Find the crowd size for each of these venues by searching through the rows where the venue column matches "MCG" or "Windy Hill".
3. Compare the crowd sizes to determine if MCG has twice the crowd of Windy Hill.

The relevant cells are:

Since the crowd size at MCG (23336) is less than twice the crowd size at Windy Hill (25867), the claim is FALSE.
